definitions.definition: In the International System of Units , the derived unit of plane angle : the angle subtended at the centre of a circle by an arc of its circumference equal in length to the radius of the circle. Symbol: rad .

main_definition: ( geometry ) In the International System of Units , the derived unit of plane angle : the angle subtended at the centre of a circle by an arc of its circumference equal in length to the radius of the circle. Symbol: rad .
